abilities.title: Aether Manipulation
abilities.description: Can control and manipulate the elements of air and water.

abilities.title: Shadow Cloak
abilities.description: Shrouds itself in shadows, becoming nearly invisible.

abilities.title: Healing Aura
abilities.description: Radiates a healing aura that can mend wounds and cure diseases.

encounters.outcome: Sir Cedric was saved from a deadly illness by the Aetherwyrm's healing aura.

relatedLegends.title: The Aetherwyrm's Blessing
relatedLegends.source: The Chronicles of Eldoria, by Elowen the Scribe

relatedLegends.title: The Shadow of Eldoria
relatedLegends.source: Tales of the Forgotten, by Alaric the Wise
